Ghosts of Memories is an adventure puzzle game with 21 unique levels located in 6 stunningly beautiful worlds. 

You will explore the lands of ancient civilizations, full of undiscovered paths and mysterious puzzles based on tricky tiles. Think logically to solve all the quests and puzzles on your journey! 


"Every single aspect of its visual representation is a masterpiece. 
Ghosts of Memories is definitely a must-have this season." - Pocketmeta

Beautiful graphics of 2.5D isometric perspective that combines the details of 2D artwork with many functionalities of a 3D environment. 

Unique sound effects composed specifically for Ghosts of Memories, creates an atmosphere as you find your way to your destination by overcoming a series of puzzles. 

Carefully designed gameplay will provide you with engaging and demanding experiences, full of unexpected solutions.
